text: Entertainment One Canada Ltd., trading as Entertainment One Canada, is a Canadian film and production company based in Toronto. It was split from Entertainment One's Canadian operations in 2023, following the sale of the majority of eOne's assets (except for its family brands division, which has been folded into Hasbro) to Lionsgate on December 27, 2023. == Television == === Current === Title Original run Network Co-production with Inherited from Entertainment One Heartland 2007–present CBC SEVEN24 Films Dynamo Films Arctic Vets 2021–present CBC Moonshine 2021–present CBC Six Eleven Media The Spencer Sisters 2023–present CTV Buffalo Gal == References ==
title: Entertainment One Canada
